Dialogue.Page: If you've played any story mod ever I probably helped get it made - I'm the lead developer of the New Horizons story mod framework! I also organized the first 5 community mod jams.

I always wanted to make story mods, but got so caught up in helping others make them that I never really got around to it myself. The only story mods I've actually made were Escape the Dreamstalker and Granite's Invitation.
I also helped make Escape Room and Christmas Story.
That said, my greatest contribution to Outer Wilds modding has to be creating the magic talking anglerfish Ernesto.
